sense.def:
A charity
je ustanova, ki zbira denar za pomoč bolnim, invalidnim ali revnim ljudem.

seg.quote: The proceeds will go to charities.

sense.def:
Charity
je tudi denar ali dar, ki ga namenimo revnim ljudem;

seg.quote: He's too proud to accept charity.

sense.def:
Charity
je tudi ljubezniv in dobrohoten odnos do drugih;

seg.quote: She found the charity in her heart to forgive them.
